entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
